foundation-theme-extraction.description: Extract colors, fonts, and custom glassmorphism CSS from specs/current/stitch_passy_planner_dashboard/passy_planner_dashboard_1/code.html.
foundation-theme-extraction.result_summary:
Extracted the following theme data:
Fonts: Body ('PT Sans'), Serif ('Playfair Display').
Colors: primary (#D0B8E3), secondary-rose (#E3B8D0), dark-bg (#0c0a0f).
Glassmorphism CSS: .glass-card (bg-white/5, backdrop-blur-xl), .glass-sidebar (bg-black/40, backdrop-blur-2xl).
Utility: .lavender-glow (drop-shadow).

foundation-tailwind-setup.description: Update passy/app/globals.css to include glassmorphism utility classes and define the custom color palette.

foundation-asset-management.description: Set up Google Fonts and Material Symbols in the root layout.tsx.

components-layout-sidebar.description: Implement a Sidebar with navigation links matching the specs.

components-layout-header.description: Implement a Header with search and user profile integration.

components-layout-dashboard.description: Create a DashboardLayout component in passy/app/dashboard.

components-atoms-statcard.description: Create a StatCard for the guest/budget/countdown display.

components-atoms-taskitem.description: Create a TaskItem component for the checklist section.

dashboard-implementation.description: Assemble the passy/app/dashboard/page.tsx using the created components.

dashboard-data-fetching.description: Use Supabase server components to fetch real user data (e.g., username, event date, guest count) to replace mockup placeholders.

dashboard-progress-visualization.description: Implement the "Planning Progress" bar and status badges using the dynamic data.

validation-visual-audit.description: Visual Audit: Compare the rendered Next.js page against passy_planner_dashboard_1/screen.png.

validation-interactivity.description: Add basic transitions and hover effects as defined in the prototypes.

foundation-styling.description: Extract colors, fonts, and custom glassmorphism CSS from specs/current/stitch_passy_planner_dashboard/passy_planner_dashboard_1/code.html. Update passy/app/globals.css with Tailwind 4 theme and utility classes. Set up Google Fonts and Material Symbols in passy/app/layout.tsx.
foundation-styling.result_summary: Verified that foundations (globals.css, layout.tsx) are correctly set up.

core-ui-components.description: Create layout components (DashboardLayout, Sidebar, Header) and atom components (GlassCard, StatCard, TaskItem) in passy/app/dashboard. Break down the specs mockups into granular React components.
core-ui-components.result_summary: Verified that all layout and atom components have been created and correctly implemented.

setup-design-system.description:
Setup Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Implement the strict 'Passy' visual identity codex. 
This includes:
- Defining custom color palette (Charcoal #120c1c, Lavender, Neon-Green) in `tailwind.config.ts`.
- Configuring backdrop-blur utilities and global styles in `src/app/globals.css`.
- Creating base UI components: `src/components/ui/GlassCard.tsx`, `src/components/ui/GlowingButton.tsx`, `src/components/ui/StatusBadge.tsx`, and `src/components/layout/AtmosphericBackground.tsx`.

Output files:
- `tailwind.config.ts`
- `src/app/globals.css`
- `src/components/ui/GlassCard.tsx`
- `src/components/ui/GlowingButton.tsx`
- `src/components/ui/StatusBadge.tsx`
- `src/components/layout/AtmosphericBackground.tsx`
setup-design-system.result_summary:
Implemented the 'Passy' visual identity system.
- Created `tailwind.config.ts` with Charcoal, Lavender, Rose, and Neon-Green palette.
- Configured `src/app/globals.css` with glassmorphism and text glow utilities.
- Created base UI components: `GlassCard`, `GlowingButton`, `StatusBadge`.
- Implemented `AtmosphericBackground` layout component with dynamic orbs.
All files located in `passy/src/`.

setup-database.description:
Design and apply the SQL schema in Supabase.
Tables required:
- `profiles` (extends `auth.users`)
- `events` (date, theme, budget_limit, mood_board_url JSONB)
- `guests` (RSVP status, dietary needs)
- `budget_items` (category, estimated, actual, status)
- `tasks` (timeline, status)
- `team_members` (RBAC)
- `saved_vendors`

Setup Row Level Security (RLS) policies for all tables.
Create a PostgreSQL trigger to automatically create a profile on user signup.

Output files:
- `supabase/schema.sql` (or similar migration/seed script)
- `src/lib/supabase.ts` (Supabase client configuration)
setup-database.result_summary:
Designed and implemented the Supabase SQL schema.
- Created tables: `profiles`, `events`, `guests`, `budget_items`, `tasks`, `team_members`, `saved_vendors`.
- Established Row Level Security (RLS) policies for secure data access.
- Created a PostgreSQL trigger to automate profile creation upon user signup.
- Configured the Supabase client in `src/lib/supabase.ts`.

setup-orchestrator.description:
Develop the client-side state management system for navigation.
- Define `Page` Enum in `src/types/navigation.ts`.
- Configure `NAV_ITEMS` in `src/constants/navigation.ts`.
- Build the `Sidebar` component (`src/components/navigation/Sidebar.tsx`) with Glassmorphism styles.
- Build the `Orchestrator` component (`src/components/navigation/Orchestrator.tsx`) with `AnimatePresence` and conditional rendering.

Output files:
- `src/types/navigation.ts`
- `src/constants/navigation.ts`
- `src/components/navigation/Sidebar.tsx`
- `src/components/navigation/Orchestrator.tsx`

setup-ai-services.description:
Create server-side utilities (Next.js Server Actions) for Gemini AI:
- `generateTheme` (returns structured JSON for theme and image prompts)
- `analyzeBudget` (returns AI Intel cards based on variances)
- `vendorSearch` (Google Search Grounding integration)

Ensure proper environment variable usage for API keys.

Output files:
- `src/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts`
- `src/app/actions/ai/generate-theme.ts`
- `src/app/actions/ai/analyze-budget.ts`
- `src/app/actions/ai/vendor-search.ts`
setup-ai-services.result_summary:
Implemented Gemini AI services:
- Created `passy/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts` to initialize the SDK.
- Created Server Actions: `generateTheme`, `analyzeBudget`, and `vendorSearch` in `passy/app/actions/ai/`.
- Installed `@google/generative-ai` dependency.
Note: Search grounding is simulated in `vendorSearch` for now.

module-theme-assistant.description:
Build the `ThemeAssistant` component:
- Chat interface for theme discovery with Gemini-1.5-flash.
- Mood Board with specified aspect ratios (4:3 for Venue, 1:1 for others).
- 'Apply Theme' logic persisting aesthetic choice to `localStorage`.
- High-fidelity visual styling using Glassmorphism components and Framer Motion.

Output files:
- `src/components/planning/ThemeAssistant.tsx`
- `src/types/theme.ts`
- `src/components/views/ThemeAssistant.tsx` (to be registered in Orchestrator)

module-budget-guest.description:
Develop the `BudgetTracker` and `GuestManager` modules:
- `BudgetTracker`: Financial health gauge, interactive expense table, and AI Intel cards.
- `GuestManager`: RSVP tracking, dietary needs, plus-one logic with high-fidelity list view and sliding side-panel.
- Both must read/write to Supabase using the configured schema.

Output files:
- `src/components/budget/BudgetTracker.tsx`
- `src/components/guests/GuestManager.tsx`
- `src/components/views/Budget.tsx`
- `src/components/views/GuestManager.tsx`

module-marketplace-messages.description:
Develop the `VendorMarketplace` and `MessageCenter`:
- `VendorMarketplace`: Display grounded search results (Google Search Grounding) with "Matches Theme" badge logic based on active theme tags.
- `MessageCenter`: Split-pane UI for vendor communications (mocked).

Output files:
- `src/components/marketplace/VendorMarketplace.tsx`
- `src/components/messages/MessageCenter.tsx`
- `src/components/views/Vendors.tsx`
- `src/components/views/Messages.tsx`
- `src/types/vendor.ts`

supabase-backend.description: Update and apply the SQL schema in Supabase as defined in info.md. Create tables for Profiles, Events, TeamMembers, Guests, BudgetItems, Tasks, and SavedVendors. Implement RLS policies for team-based access and the handle_new_user trigger. Expected files: passy/supabase/schema.sql (new file to track schema).

spa-orchestrator.description: Enhance the Orchestrator component to handle state-based navigation using the Page enum. Implement fluid transitions between modules using Framer Motion. Add logic to toggle between Workspace (with Sidebar) and Standalone views (Landing, Invitations). Expected files: passy/types/navigation.ts, passy/components/navigation/Orchestrator.tsx, passy/components/navigation/Sidebar.tsx.

ai-service-layer.description: Setup Gemini 1.5 Flash integration in passy/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts. Implement Next.js Server Actions: generateTheme (returning 5 image prompts: Venue, Table, Invite, Cake, Decor), analyzeBudget (returning AI Intel cards), and vendorSearch (using Google Search Grounding). Expected files: passy/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/generate-theme.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/analyze-budget.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/vendor-search.ts.

theme-assistant.description: Refine the Theme Assistant module. Update the chat interface and MoodBoard component to support 5 Imagen 4.0 images with specific aspect ratios (4:3 for Venue, 1:1 for others). Implement persistence to localStorage. Expected files: passy/components/planning/ThemeAssistant.tsx, passy/components/planning/MoodBoard.tsx.

budget-guest-modules.description: Update BudgetTracker to include the 'Financial Health' gauge and 'AI Intel' cards. Update GuestManager to include the sliding side-panel for guest details and RSVP management. Ensure data persistence with Supabase. Expected files: passy/components/views/BudgetTracker.tsx, passy/components/views/GuestManager.tsx.

vendor-marketplace.description: Build the Vendor Marketplace view with grounded search results and 'Matches Theme' logic. Build the Message Center with a split-pane UI for vendor communications. Expected files: passy/components/views/VendorMarketplace.tsx, passy/components/views/MessageCenter.tsx.

refine-design-system.description: Refine the visual identity of Passy. Update globals.css to use charcoal (#120c1c) background and strict glassmorphism spec (backdrop-blur-2xl, bg-white/5, border-white/10) as defined in info.md. Update atomic components in passy/components/atoms (GlassCard, GlowingButton, StatusBadge) to match these standards. Expected files: passy/app/globals.css, passy/components/atoms/GlassCard.tsx, passy/components/atoms/GlowingButton.tsx, passy/components/atoms/StatusBadge.tsx.

spa-orchestrator-v2.description: Enhance the Orchestrator component to handle state-based navigation using the Page enum. Implement fluid transitions between modules using Framer Motion. Add logic to toggle between Workspace (with Sidebar) and Standalone views (Landing, Invitations). Expected files: passy/types/navigation.ts, passy/components/navigation/Orchestrator.tsx, passy/components/navigation/Sidebar.tsx.

ai-service-layer-v2.description: Setup Gemini 1.5 Flash integration in passy/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts. Implement Next.js Server Actions: generateTheme (returning 5 image prompts: Venue, Table, Invite, Cake, Decor), analyzeBudget (returning AI Intel cards), and vendorSearch (using Google Search Grounding). Expected files: passy/lib/ai/gemini-client.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/generate-theme.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/analyze-budget.ts, passy/app/actions/ai/vendor-search.ts.
